sentence: Bringing along names like Kari Lake and Mike Lindell to warm up the crowd, Trump didn’t hold back when it came time for him to speak, bashing President Joe Biden’s leadership when it came to the Southern border, the Capitol Hill January 6 incident, and COVID-19.

title: Trump Rails Biden’s ‘Ridiculous Unscientific’ Big Pharma Mandates And Dem Race-Based COVID Treatments [VIDEOS]
